marginalia.anchor_text: Que[m] Gilbertus & Iohannes, Comites Glouer. & VVar. prae caeteris nobilibus terrae suae, honorificentius susceperu[n]t, sibi per dies multos in Castris suis, de Tonebrege & Reigate, cum non modico apparatu, conuiuium & maximum gaudium facientes

position.marginalia_text: Castru[m] de Reigat. Io[hann]is Comitis Warrena[e].

person.name: John de Warenne, 6th Earl of Surrey

marginalia.translation: Reigate Castle of John de Warenne, 6th Earl of Surrey.

marginalia.anchor_text: Que[m] Gilbertus & Iohannes, Comites Glouer. & VVar. prae caeteris nobilibus terrae suae, honorificentius susceperu[n]t, sibi per dies multos in Castris suis, de Tonebrege & Reigate, cum non modico apparatu, conuiuium & maximum gaudium facientes

position.marginalia_text: Castellu[m] de Tonebrigde Gilberti Comitis de Clare

person.name: Gilbert de Clare, 7th Earl of Gloucester

marginalia.translation: Tonbridge Castle of Gilbert de Clare, 7th Earl of Gloucester.

underline.text: in Castris suis, de Tonebrege & Reigate
